reference.shortdesc: A simple list is a list that contains a few items of short, phrase-like content, for example, a list of materials in a kit or package.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Although rendering is left up to implementations, the list items are rendered without bullets or numbers, on the assumption that each item is short enough to fit on one line, and needs no additional differentiation from its neighbors.
